mapper.select: select count(*) FROM workspace WHERE url = #{url}
mapper.insert: insert all into workspace (url, space_name, start_date, end_date, linked_repo, admin) values (#{url}, #{space_name}, to_date(#{start_date}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), to_date(#{end_date}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), #{linked_repo}, #{admin}) into workspace_user (url, u_idx, role) values (#{url}, #{admin}, 'admin') select * from dual
mapper.select: select url, space_name, to_char(start_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS start_date, to_char(end_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS end_date, linked_repo from workspace where url in (select url from workspace_user where u_idx = #{u_idx} )
